welcome_message.description:
Hello! I'm a bot that will try to help you with the installation process.
Please tell me, what is the issue.
Respond with a single number, etc. 3

fields.value: How to download and install Livebot?
I need more help with downloading and installing Livebot.
Where can I find my bot token?
I can't log into my bot.
My problem isn't listed here.

fields.name: Windows
fields.value: Type `windows`

fields.name: Mac
fields.value: Type `mac`

fields.name: Linux
fields.value: Type `linux`

fields.name: 1. Download Node.js from https://nodejs.org/en.
fields.value: Please download the latest version.

fields.name: 2. Install the Node.js.
fields.value: Open the downloaded installer and follow the instructions to install.

fields.name: 3. Download LiveBot from our GitHub page and extract it.
fields.value: Click the `Code` on [this website](https://github.com/SebOuellette/LiveBot) then click `Download ZIP`.

fields.name: 4. Click the path bar(!) in the file explorer and type in cmd, and then press enter.
fields.value: Don't know where the path bar is? Check the under embed.

fields.name: L. Now, type in `npm install`, then, when it finishes, type in `npm test`.
fields.value: That will launch the LiveBot app!

fields.name: 1. (If you didn't install Node.js) Open your terminal and run these commands...
fields.value:
```bash
/bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)"
brew install nodebrew
nodebrew install-binary latest
exit
```

fields.name: 2. Download LiveBot from our GitHub page and extract it.
fields.value: Click the `Code` on [this website](https://github.com/SebOuellette/LiveBot) then click `Download ZIP`.

fields.name: 3. cd to the directory or write `cd ` and drag and drop the folder into the terminal
fields.value:
If you don't know how-to, see the under video.
(I don't have a Mac, but I used the software and tried to do it as if I were using a Mac.)

fields.name: L. Now, type in `npm install`, then, when it finishes, type in `npm test`.
fields.value: That will launch the LiveBot app!

fields.name: 1. Install node.js if you don't have it.
fields.value:
You can use nvm nodebrew too, but I prefer to use n
```bash
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tj/n/master/bin/n -o n
bash n lts
```

fields.name: 2. Download LiveBot from our GitHub page and extract it.
fields.value: Click the `Code` on [this website](https://github.com/SebOuellette/LiveBot) then click `Download ZIP`.

fields.name: 3. Right click and press on `Open in Terminal` or some variation of it.
fields.value: If you don't have that then cd to the path that contains the files.

fields.name: L. Now, type in `npm install`, then, when it finishes, type in `npm test`.
fields.value: That will launch the LiveBot app!

2.description: For more help related to LiveBot installation please ask [here](https://discord.com/channels/770232718339604522/777904830541856778/777904896715259924)

3.description:
You can find your bot's token [here](https://discord.com/developers/applications)
Select your bot, and copy the token which is under the 'Bot' section.

4.description: For help related to logging into LiveBot, please ask [here](https://discord.com/channels/770232718339604522/777905748188987442/777905831193870396)

5.description: Please ask for help that isn't listed [here](https://discord.com/channels/770232718339604522/777899716914577438/777899903430164561)
